actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the House from May 23, 1985, to June 3, 1985, and for the adjournment of the Senate from May 24, 1985, to June 3, 1985.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 23 to June 3, 1985, and of the Senate from May 24 to June 3, 1985.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the House from May 23, 1985, to June 3, 1985, and for the adjournment of the Senate from May 24, 1985, to June 3, 1985.
